title: Remove horizontal inset on LilyCard hover background on desktop only

requirements.text: Update the LilyCard inset hover background layer so that on desktop (Tailwind `lg` breakpoint and up) it has no horizontal inset (i.e., the hover background reaches the left and right edges of the card), while preserving the current vertical inset, rounded corners, opacity transition, and non-interactive behavior. Do not change any other layout or spacing.

quotes: can you remove the horizontal inset  only on lilies on desktop version. thats it nothing else.

acceptanceCriteria: On viewports >= `lg`, hovering a lily card shows the hover background flush to the card's left and right edges (no horizontal inset).
On viewports >= `lg`, the hover background still keeps the existing vertical inset and rounded corners.
On viewports < `lg`, the hover background remains unchanged (still inset on all sides as it is currently).
No other page/container/layout spacing is changed outside of the LilyCard hover background layer.

constraints: Frontend change only; no backend changes.
Do not modify any files listed in frontend immutablePaths.
Limit changes to the LilyCard hover background inset behavior on desktop only; do not adjust unrelated spacing, containers, or grid layout.
nonGoals: Changing overall desktop page/container padding or column widths on Home/Pond/Lily pages.
Changing LilyCard content layout, typography, or interactions beyond the hover background inset.
